2164.subject: SPED
2164.descrlong: Provides prospective special educators with opportunities to investigate how general educators plan, implement, modify, and monitor instruction. Students reflect on preferred practices; study the Ca Standards for the Tchg Prof and the TPEs; analyze pedagogical skills appropriate to the core curriculum; and responsiveness to student needs and characteristics.  To include online, hybrid and face to face.  (This course may be waived with verif of Gen Ed Tchg Cred)
